title: All the champs that need to be nerfed
body: {{champion:105}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:39}}   They do so much damage man they are so broken no counterplay rito pls nerf

replies.body:
While we're at it, let's nerf {{champion:6}} {{champion:82}} and {{champion:3}}.

I feel like I'm missing someone...

Nah, probably not.  But I can't help but shake this feeling...
Because this is a gameplay complaining thread in memes and games, or a joke that's obfuscated enough to seem like one.
1. Why hasn't rito nerfed {{champion:114}} ? Obviously broken

> [{quoted}](name=SpookyNeedle,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=piro2RQ5,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-07-25T09:14:00.275+0000)
>
> 1. Why hasn't rito nerfed {{champion:114}} ? Obviously broken

Thry did. They are buffing her now
Have you guys realized that that was a joke? I main Fiora >_> she's pretty balanced right now

As much as I hate fizz... 




No...
As long as they dont touch {{champion:102}} I am fine

I don't play any of these champions, but I play against many of them.

Let's see:
hate, fine, dislike, hate, dislike, dislike, dislike, dislike, hate, hate, hate, dislike, fine, ehh, dislike

I know he shouldn't be on this list, but I also hate {{champion:268}}

Heheheh pantheon isn't on that list
*Cough* I mean uhh Yes nerf irelia :^)... Oh wait she isn't on that list
UHHH
Nerf fizz.. Yeah that'll do

The only ones I can really see of those that need nerfs are {{champion:105}} {{champion:122}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:39}} maybe {{champion:80}} early game nerf/late game buff.
